caption.p: Effective number of codons values for structural (S, E, M, N) and nonstructural genes (RNA‐dependent RNA polymerase and main protease genes) from SARS‐CoV‐2, pangolins Beta‐CoV, SARS CoV, Bat CoV, and MERS CoV. CoV, coronavirus; MERS, Middle East respiratory syndrome; SARS, severe acute respiratory syndrome
